thread.title: Murdoch's News Corp posts 6 percent rise in quarterly revenue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Murdoch's News Corp posts 6 percent rise in quarterly revenue
text:
May 10, 2018 / 8:25 PM / a minute ago Murdoch's News Corp posts 6 percent rise in quarterly revenue Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - News Corp ( NWSA.O ), the owner of Wall Street Journal and book publisher HarperCollins, reported a 5.8 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Thursday, as more people used its real estate app and website. FILE PHOTO: The Fox News electronic ticker is seen outside the News Corporation building in New York City, in New York, U.S., November 8, 2017. REUTERS/Shannon Stapleton/File Photo
Net loss available to stockholders widened to $1.13 billion, or $1.94 per share, in the third quarter ended Mar. 31, from $5 million, or one cent per share, a year earlier.
Total revenue at the company, which is controlled by media mogul Rupert Murdoch, rose to $2.09 billion from $1.98 billion. Reporting by Vibhuti Sharma and Muvija M in Bengaluru in Bengaluru; Editing by Shounak Dasgupta
